scenario_text.value:
...Huh? Hey, fewer of them are chasing us
than we expected, right?
Less than half came! What should we do?
Well, all we can do is run for now!

This doesn’t look good... Fine, guess we’ll
play decoy, too!
Ah! Wait, Kaito!
Hey, Miu! Ah jeez... I’ll go after her!
Guess I have to go, too.

So are we, Takuma! We’ll leave the Holy
Beast to you!
All the enemies are gone, but...

If we end up having to fight the Holy
Beasts, I’m not confident about our numbers.
(What the heck should I do now?)
Call everyone back.
Also act as a decoy.
Find the shrine entrance.
Call everyone back.

We can’t fight the Holy Beast like
this... I’ll call everyone back!

Keep calm, Takuma. That would only draw the
enemy’s ranks into battle.
Yeah, I guess that’s true...
Also act as a decoy.
W-well then I’ll draw away the enemy, too!

Hold yourself together, Takuma! Such action
would be meaningless!
Oh, uh, that makes sense. Sorry...
Find shrine entrance.

I can’t waste their resolve... We have to
find the entrance to the shrine, now!

How, precisely? Fumbling through the darkness
will only occupy us until the enemy returns.
That’s true...

Ah, Takuma! Look over there! Something opened
up!
You’re right... Could that be the entrance?!

Probably. I sense the Holy Beast on
the other side.
Okay, let’s go in!
